Principal InvestigatorsGeoffrey Liu, MDPrincess Margaret Cancer Centre, Toronto, Canada
Configuration.Description: Genetic factors play an important role in susceptibility to head and neck cancer and could also explain differences in response to treatment and outcome. The goal of this project is to investigate genetic variation involved in oral and oropharyngeal cancer susceptibility by performing the largest GWAS on these diseases, using a novel genotyping tool specifically designed for cancer studies by the OncoArray Network. This project encompasses data from approximately 6000 oral and pharynx cancer cases and 4000 controls derived from 12 epidemiological studies most of case-control design. The genotyping was centralized at the Center for Inherited Disease Research (CIDR), and the epidemiological data harmonization and analysis were completed at the International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC). This study was supported by National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIDCR) with direct funding to CIDR.
Configuration.StudyInEx:
Cancer cases comprised the following ICD codes: oral cavity (C02.0-C02.9, C03.0-C03.9, C04.0-C04.9, C05.0-C06.9), oropharynx (C01.9, C02.4, C09.0-C10.9), hypopharynx (C13.0-C13.9), overlapping (C14 and combination of other sites), and 25 oral or pharyngeal cases with unknown ICD code (other).
Controls: cancer-free controls.

Configuration.StudyHistory:
This submission contains data genotyped at CIDR as part of the oral and oropharyngeal OncoArray study. Genotypes calls were made at Dartmouth College with common protocols for OncoArray Network projects. Epidemiological studies that contributed samples are listed in Table 1. Controls from Toronto and EPIC studies are shared with the Lung OncoArray Study that are not part of this dataset. These will be uploaded with the lung OncoArray.

Table 1

Study Name Principal Investigator Study Design Reference
Carolina Head and Neck Cancer Epidemiology (Chance) Andrew F Olshan Population-based case-control PMID:20049634
Gencapo Eloiza H. Tajara Multicenter Hospital-based case-control PMID:24474236
Alcohol-Related Cancers and Genetic susceptibility in Europe (Arcage) Paul Brennan Multicenter Hospital-based case-control PMID:18830131
IARC Central Europe Paul Brennan Multicenter Hospital-based case-control PMID:16614111
European Prospective Investigation into Cancer and Nutrition (EPIC) Paul Brennan Multicenter cohort study PMID:12639222
IARC Latin America Paul Brennan Multicenter Hospital-based case-control PMID:21607590
IARC oral cancer (ORC) Silvia Franceschi Multicenter Hospital-based case-control PMID:14652239
Maastricht Martin Lacko
Wilbert Peters		 Hospital-based case-control PMID:21351260
University of Pittsburgh Brenda Diergaarde Hospital-based case-control PMID:23619143
Rome Stefania Boccia Hospital-based case-control PMID:20861397
Toronto Rayjean Hung
Geoffrey Liu		 Hospital-based case-control PMID:24519853
Head and neck 5000 (HN5000) Andy Ness Multicenter HNC clinical cohort PMID:25519023

ConsentGroup.longName: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
